website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality treat bag that can withstand a lot of handling.
pros: Includes removable belt and shoulder straps as well as a durable belt clip
Easily open drawstring top with one hand
Waste bag dispenser is built in
Thick nylon material keeps treats dry
cons: Spacious treat compartment is wide open and lacks dividers

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because I started volunteering as a dog walker at the Humane Society and I need to be as hands-free as possible while walking the dogs. I wanted this specifically for the belt-bag/shoulder strap options, the pockets to hold treats and other items, as well as the poop bag dispenser option. I like it! My only issue is the dispenser for the poop bags, it looks like it’s specifically for headphones which I find odd as it seems a lot of people are using it for the bags, so it’s a very small hole and difficult to pull the bags out of. Either way, it’s fine! It will do the job and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality bag!
customer_reviews.text: I took my chances on this bag, figuring if I can wasn’t happy with it I can always return it. I’m definitely keeping it! The quality is top notch. It’s extremely sturdy, well made, and very versatile. I have pretty severe fibromyalgia yet I can wear this bag around my waist with absolutely no discomfort whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.Colin

customer_reviews.title: Nice size an love the material
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking dog treat pouch, love the hounds-tooth material. A little larger than what I was expecting, but that makes it more useful for my needs. I have used it as a quick carryall purse on a spur of the moment need. I like it very much, may even buy my BFF one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking dogs and animal training
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife when she was volunteering at the county animal shelter. She loved it! Has several compartments and it’s big enough to hold her cell phone and cigarettes along with dog treats. Would highly recommend to anyone who walks dogs or is training an animal.
customer_reviews.author: Rjohnson730

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the dog park
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the dog park, we just put some training treats and a tennis ball in the pouch and we're ready to go. The bag dispenser is a great feature and the pockets for keys and your phone are great too. The versatility to carry it around the waste, clipped to your pants or over the shoulder is also very nice. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Well made and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This training pouch is exactly what I was looking for. There are many options of how to wear it. I’m very impressed with the construction and durability of the pouch. Also, there are two zipper pockets that fit my phone, keys, etc very easily.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Multi-functional bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very multi-functional but I did find the area where the bags go a bit difficult to load and get the bags out of the tight opening.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Useful for much more than treats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I wear it cross body and have it filled with cleaning supplies, treats, my phone,...
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: well made and roomy just a little heavy but that ...
customer_reviews.text: well made and roomy just a little heavy but that is because of the quality materials- bag should last well beyond training stage...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great treat bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a loop on both sides making it easy to attach a clicker. My only frustration with it is small and that is it's too deep for quick access to treats but because it is so deep you can store a lot of treats. The quality of the bag is perfect and has no issues
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: ... need one but I found out it is a great product for the dog walk
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would need one but I found out it is a great product for the dog walk. The bag dispenser is a great feature and the pockets are great too. A lot of other nice features, like the versatility to carry it around the waste, clipped to your pants. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hua Tu

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sturdy enough for my needs I guess
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke on the second day. Wasn't sturdy enough for my needs I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Black

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love! It’s the perfect size and carries a ton of treats!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stovall

customer_reviews.title: This bag is fantastic! It keeps everything right where I need it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic! It keeps everything right where I need it, and I never have to worry about leaving anything behind.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E Newcombe

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was larger than I thought it would be, so it went back.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Pet N Pet dog Treat bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bag for dog training, the only thing that is a down side to it, is the compartment for the poop bags does not work great.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann Painter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag to carry the essentials while on a walk or going to the park
customer_reviews.author: Redneck Sailor

product_meta.title: PET N PET Dog Treat Training Pouch-3 Ways to Wear Dog Treat Pouch with Built-in Poop Bag Dispenser-(3 Rolls Rainbow Poop Bags Included)
feature_bullets: Made with lightweight and durable nylon to keep treats and other doggie essentials secure and dry when on the go
Convenient pocket at front of pouch is a quick and safe place to store car keys, cellphones and other personal or doggy items
Built-in waste bag dispenser is attached to the right side instead of the rear for quick and easy access for taking care of messes
Comes with a removable shoulder strap, heavy-duty belt clip and adjustable 42” waist strap for ultimate carrying convenience
Large main storage compartment can quickly be opened or closed with one hand, thanks to tough and flexible drawstring
